items.name: Component_PixelateAnimation
items.content:
# ===================================================================
#
#   Script: Component_PixelateAnimation
#
#   $$COPYRIGHT$$
#
# ===================================================================
class Component_PixelateAnimation extends gs.Component_Animation
    ###*
    * Executes a pixelate-animation on a game-object.
    *
    * @module gs
    * @class Component_PixelateAnimation
    * @extends gs.Component_Animation
    * @memberof gs
    * @constructor
    ###
    constructor: (data) ->
        super
        
        ###*
        * The easing-object used for the animation.
        * @property easing
        * @type gs.Easing
        ###
        @widthEasing = new gs.Easing(null, data?.widthEasing)
        @heightEasing = new gs.Easing(null, data?.heightEasing)
        
    ###*
    * Updates the blend-animation.
    *
    * @method update
    ###   
    update: ->
        super
        if !@widthEasing.isRunning and !@heightEasing.isRunning then return

        @widthEasing.updateValue()
        @heightEasing.updateValue()
        @object.effects.pixelate.width = @widthEasing.value
        @object.effects.pixelate.height = @heightEasing.value
        
        if !@widthEasing.isRunning and !@heightEasing.isRunning
            @callback?(@object, this)
 
    ###*
    * Starts the pixelate-animation.
    *
    * @method start
    * @param {number} power The target power.
    * @param {number} duration The duration in frames.
    * @param {Object} easingType The easing-type.
    * @param {function} [callback] An optional callback called if the animation is finished. 
    ###  
    start: (width, height, duration, easingType, callback) ->
        @callback = callback
        @widthEasing.type = easingType || gs.Easings.EASE_LINEAR[gs.EasingTypes.EASE_IN]
        @heightEasing.type = easingType || gs.Easings.EASE_LINEAR[gs.EasingTypes.EASE_IN]
        if @object.effects.pixelate.width == width and @object.effects.pixelate.height == height then return @callback?(@object, this)
        
        if duration == 0 or @isInstantSkip()
            @object.effects.pixelate.width = width
            @object.effects.pixelate.height = height
            @callback?(@object, this)
        else
            @widthEasing.startValue(@object.effects.pixelate.width, width - @object.effects.pixelate.width, duration)
            @heightEasing.startValue(@object.effects.pixelate.height, height - @object.effects.pixelate.height, duration)
        
gs.Component_PixelateAnimation = Component_PixelateAnimation
